Restaurant Manager Job at Prestigious Consulting Group




        
    

        
        Prestigious Consulting Group is a professional HR consultancy firm that focuses on improving organizational performance through strategic people & process management.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Restaurant Manager

Job Location: Fola Osibo, Lekki - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Work Days: Thursday - Sunday (4pm till late)

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a results-driven and experienced Restaurant Manager to oversee all operations of our lounge. The ideal candidate will ensure smooth daily operations, effective staff coordination, guest satisfaction, and profitability while maintaining the highest hospitality standards.


Key Responsibilities


	Oversee day-to-day restaurant, bar, and kitchen operations
	Supervise and motivate all team members to ensure excellent service delivery
	Coordinate front and back-of-house activities to maintain efficient service flow
	Handle guest concerns professionally and provide prompt resolutions
	Track sales performance and develop strategies to increase revenue
	Ensure strict compliance with health, safety, and hygiene regulations
	Monitor stock levels, approve restocking, and reduce wastage
	Prepare daily sales, expense, and attendance reports
	Lead staff recruitment, training, and performance evaluations
	Collaborate with management on marketing initiatives and promotional events.


Requirements & Skills


	Interested candidates should possess an OND, HND, or Bachelor's Degree with 3–5 years of experience managing a restaurant, lounge, or hospitality outlet
	Strong leadership, communication, and organizational abilities
	Knowledge of POS systems, inventory control, and financial reporting
	Excellent interpersonal and customer service skills
	Ability to work flexible hours, including evenings and weekends
	Residing within or close to Lekki is an added advantage.


Salary
N250,000 / Month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hrprestigiousconsulting@outlook.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

	Excellent analytical, communication, and organizational skills.
	High level of accuracy and attention to detail.
	Integrity, confidentiality, and professionalism.
